# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We support the latest released version of the MongoDB Go Driver. Please ensure you are using the most recent version before reporting a vulnerability.

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in the MongoDB Go Driver, please follow MongoDBâ€™s responsible disclosure process:

- **Do not publicly disclose the vulnerability.**
- Report it by following the instructions at [MongoDB Vulnerability Reporting](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/tutorial/create-a-vulnerability-report/).
